thread.title: Kushner, Ivanka Trump Pushed to Remove Words Critical of Climate Deal From Executive Order - WSJ
thread.title_full: Kushner, Ivanka Trump Pushed to Remove Words Critical of Climate Deal From Executive Order - WSJ

author: Amy Harder
title: Kushner, Ivanka Trump Pushed to Remove Words Critical of Climate Deal From Executive Order - WSJ
text:
Kushner, Ivanka Trump Pushed to Remove Words Critical of Climate Deal From Executive Order Trump plans to issue orders rolling back Obama climate agenda soon; language critical of Paris accord removed By @peterwsj Updated Feb. 23, 2017 5:42 p.m. ET 
WASHINGTON—At the request of White House senior adviser Jared Kushner and his wife, Ivanka Trump, language critical of a global climate deal was struck from an executive order President Donald Trump is planning to sign soon, according to multiple people familiar with the move. 
Mr. Trump is expected to sign within days at least two executive orders beginning the process of dismantling former President Barack Obama’s climate and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
